elements.text:
At a work party, your friend introduces you to an attractive friend of theirs you have not met before. The next morning, you notice that they sent you an email.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: They may want to just be my friend, and I'm okay with that.
They thought that I was enjoyable to talk to.
I think they want to get to know me.
They may stop emailing me after I respond, but they're probably just really busy
They probably meant to email someone else instead.
